name: Brain Tour: All The Little Guys
name_original: Brain Tour: All The Little Guys
description:
Brain Tour: All The Little Guys is a tour through my mind, kind of! This story is completely autobiographical and completely fictional. Walk around and talk to 15 thoughts! That's it!

Content warnings for: discussion of suicide, self harm, in depth discussions on trauma, retraumatization, and the healing process, grief for lost loved ones, and probably some stuff that could trigger derealization. 

Image Description for Cover Photo: A pink on blue image made in an 8bit generator that, if viewed very kindly, could be described as a goat's head.
